I have written exactly one test for a validation that uses struts2
annotations:

@Test
public void testEmailShouldMatchRegex() throws Exception {
Method method = UpdateSettingsAction.class.getMethod("getEmail");
RegexFieldValidator annotation = method.getAnnotation(
RegexFieldValidator.class);

assertThat("a@b.c", matches(annotation.expression()));
assertThat("a@b", not(matches(annotation.expression())));
assertThat("ab.c", not(matches(annotation.expression())));
assertThat("kevin@...", matches(annotation.expression()));
}
